# The `SCCPSolver` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sccpsolver">SCCPSolver</a> - This interface class is a general purpose solver for Sparse Conditional <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> Propagation (SCCP). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sccpsolver">SCCPSolver</a> - This interface class is a general purpose solver for Sparse Conditional <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> Propagation (SCCP).

Definition at line 65 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/sccpsolver-h">SCCPSolver.h</a>.

resolvedUndefsIn - While solving the dataflow for a function, we assume that branches on undef values cannot reach any of their successors.

### trackValueOfArgument() {#a3bca075219cfb484e464a6f89d37786d}

This works with both scalars and structs.

### trackValueOfGlobalVariable() {#a199003a361f6d87612ab03c249ab04c6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void SCCPSolver::trackValueOfGlobalVariable (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42; GV)</>}>
trackValueOfGlobalVariable - Clients can use this method to inform the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sccpsolver">SCCPSolver</a> that it should track loads and stores to the specified global variable if it can.

This is only legal to call if performing Interprocedural SCCP.
